channel.title: RaidonX! Best [PI] 24 skills customs great eco
channel.description:
[img]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u645/hypernexon/Picture_zps201eac3a.jpg[/img]
[url=http://raidonx.webs.com]http://raidonx.webs.com[/url]
About RaidonX: This is a [PI] 317/667 i made this source from a clean base i ripped some parts from (TrisidiaX)-(InsidiaX)-(Matrix)-(Soul-split)-And i did 60% of the work on my own i am an expirenced Owner I've owned these servers (Swag-x) (ice-pkz) (Helix-World) (Rune-x-scape) (hypervision) And that's it well anyway about information about the current server (RaidonX), 317/667 well here is the features...
[center]-602 NPC Amount: 11257 -667 graphics -602 Skill Interface -new staffzone -Fading Hitmarks -Christmas event -Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses. -Combat Icons Next to Damage -Dungeoneering - 8 floors -Summoning Special Attacks -Dicing System -10Man "Raid" Style Bosses -Nomad -Introduction of Red Dragons, Very Active Pking [font=helvetica neue][size=14px]-Wilderness Revernants[/size][/font] -Custom PK'ing Skill -Elite Slayer Tasks -All NPC's around the World -More Advanaced Skilling than PI -FULLY working Overloads 100% RS -39 Jad Waves, Custom -Unique Custom Home -Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging! -100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! -PKP Shops -100% Corrected Item Stats -Even More NPC Anims Added -Player Owned Shops - by doing ::myshop -Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded -PERFECT Bridding / Switching -Soulwars Cape & More Items Added -Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect's) -Critical Hits (RS Hitsplat) -Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated -Instant Loading -Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects -Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces -667 RS Graphics -Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces -NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE -Working Spirit Shield Effects -Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects -Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields -NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED sucks for u glitchers lol -602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters -Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother! -Donaters has a portal for funpk :) -Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed -Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and [font=inherit][size=inherit]HP[/size][/font] -Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server -Near Flawless Combat System -Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow -Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring -Dungeoneering is by far the most advanced from ANY server! -Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild) -Very customisabled source files, as written in PI / DSPK style. -Real RS Barrage Orb's for non freezing barrages. -Perfect full screen
Well there are a few features i didnt want to spend another hour or so adding more :P well thanks for reading and i hope you enjoy the server
-Nexon-
Sit back and relax to this video! its a little sloppy but meh its ok for now right? Comming soon, sorry had to post it so i dont lost the project [/center]
[url=http://raidonx.webs.com]http://raidonx.webs.com[/url]

item.title: RaidonX! Best [PI] 24 skills customs great eco
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

i ripped some parts from (TrisidiaX)-(InsidiaX)-(Matrix)-(Soul-split)

Why you would rip from trisidiax is beyond me…
Matrix? Good to know you know how to convert…
Soul-Split? Considering the newer versions aren’t released/leaked as far I know I don’t know why you would lol.

Read full topic
item.source: RaidonX! Best [PI] 24 skills customs great eco

About RaidonX: This is a [PI] 317/667 i made this source from a clean base i ripped some parts from (TrisidiaX)-(InsidiaX)-(Matrix)-(Soul-split)-And i did 60% of the work on my own i am an expirenced Owner I’ve owned these servers (Swag-x) (ice-pkz) (Helix-World) (Rune-x-scape) (hypervision) And that’s it well anyway about information about the current server (RaidonX), 317/667 well here is the features…
